prompt_set module

Module for the PromptSet class used to represent prompts in a dataset (allows for maximum efficiency when running on model).

class prompt_set.PromptSet(prompts_dict: dict)[source]

Bases: Dataset

A dataset of prompts. Consists of a dictionary where:

  • key = prompt

  • value = dictionary:

    • subset: The name of the subset the prompt belongs to

    • output_categories: A list of expected output categories for the prompt, None if the prompt is open-ended

get_expected_outputs(prompt: str)[source]

Returns the expected output categories for the specified prompt as a list.

get_subset(subset_name: str)[source]

Get a subset of prompts from the prompt set.

Parameters:

subset_name – The name of the subset to get

Returns:

A PromptSet object containing the prompts in the specified subset

get_subsets_dict()[source]

Get all subsets in the prompt set, as a dictionary of subset names and Subset objects.

items()[source]

Returns a dict_items object containing all prompts in the prompt set and their associated information (consists of the subset the prompt belongs to and a list of the prompt’s expected outputs)

print_prompts(subset_name: str = None)[source]

Print all prompts in the prompt set, or all prompts in a specified subset.

Parameters:

subset_name – (optional) The name of the subset to print instead of the full prompt set.
